text: 7:25 Akar Mogomem 12:14; 13:5-6Eghtɨ an akar kurabar Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim mɨkɨmɨva, egh an gumazamiziba dɨkabɨnam. Egh me Arazir God Me Ganɨngiziba ko, dughiar ekiar Godɨn ziam feba, da batoghsɨ damuam. Egh an azenir pumuning ko mɨkezim ko akuamɨn Godɨn gumazamizibagh ativagh men ganam.7:25 Aramɨn akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Marazi ghaze, an azenir pumuning ko mɨkezim ko akuam mɨgei. Ezɨ marazi ghaze, akar kam, a guizbangɨra, akar mogomem, egha an osɨmtɨzim kam gɨvaghamin dughiam deragha an gun mɨgeir puvatɨ.
